course_description: This course will focus on the price discovery process in financial markets. The readings include both theory and empirical papers and will cover Rational Expectations Models, Price Setting, Bid-Ask Spread, Information & Price Discovery, and Liquidity and Asset Pricing.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the PhD program.
schedule_location: T 1pm-4pm in Goizueta Foundation Ctr W521
sections: Class Nbr: 2538, Section #: 5101, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 1-4p, Instructor: T. Chordia, Status: Open
